title: Rito MVP
body: How stupid you fools running this circus are sometimes. Seriously. I was disconnected just ONCE tonight due to an internet problem, and reconnected before the match ended. In return I've been placed in a low priority queue for 20 minutes? Who the hell is honestly going to sit around for exactly 20 minutes just do they can get into a game in the first place. 5 minute queue's, I understand. Heck, I'd rather a ban in all honesty. I don't really give two craps if I don't play for the next month. But instead you may as well of perma banned my account because I ain't never going to sit around for such a bullshit amount of time, just so I can spend another 10 minutes dealing with kids dodging, to finally get into a match after half an hour, just to have more kids feed and troll, all over ONE disconnection that I'm sure your data could prove was latency related and not my fault.

replies.body:
100% agreed.

They recently had maintenance that affected a bunch of ISP's in certain regions and didn't realize that it would cause a whole boatload of disconnects and server errors that prevented people from playing. 

I copped low priority que for this but wasnt too worried because I sent them a ticket about it and thought "Surely they wouldn't force a punishment on people when it wasn't their fault? Surely they would rescind any bans or demotions or anything negative that happened to their players as a result of their own incompetance."

How fucking wrong I was. I got my support ticket back today and they "cant" rescind the low priority punishment.

Bunch of clowns.
